name: Integrity Impact to the Vulnerable System
description: This metric measures the impact to integrity of a successfully exploited vulnerability.

values.name: None
values.description: There is no loss of integrity within the Vulnerable System.

values.name: Low
values.description: Modification of data is possible, but the attacker does not have control over the consequence of a modification, or the amount of modification is limited. The data modification does not have a direct, serious impact to the Vulnerable System.

values.name: High
values.description: There is a total loss of integrity, or a complete loss of protection.
